Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

Cashew Butter 56 Tbsp
Collagen Powder 2 cup
Cacao Powder Unsweetened 1 cup and wash
40 Pitted Dates 40 unit
Water 1 cup

6103 calories

33 sodium

195 sugar

0 fiber (Cashew Butter/Collagen Powder/Cacao Powder Unsweetened/Pitted Date/Water Data Missing)

129 protein

0 total_cost (Cashew Butter/Collagen Powder/Cacao Powder Unsweetened/Pitted Date Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 65 Minutes

Timer 5 minutes Soak 40 dates in a bowl
Put into blender 40 Pitted Dates checking that there are no pits
Put into blender 2 cups Collagen Powder
Put into blender 1 cup Cacao Powder Unsweetened
Put into blender 1 cup Water
Blend for 30 seconds, stir, repeat until dough like
Put into blender 2 full 16 ounce container of 56 Tbsp Cashew Butter
Blend for 10 seconds, stir, repeat until dough like
Take a tbsp of batter and cut on cutting board, repeat until no more batter. Makes around 60
Timer 60 minutes Put on plastic cutting board and put into freezer
     |- Wash blender while still able to. (Wait a day and its 200% harder to clean)
Transfer pieces into plastic container and keep in freezer
